description:
Wikipedia app with domain fronting
Patched Wikipedia app with:
  * Built-in DNS over HTTPS on Wikimedia DNS.
  * HTTPS Server Name Indication stripping for bypassing DPI.
  * Limit to IPv6 only, which is a workaround for China's IPv4 blocking.
See https://phabricator.wikimedia.org/T327286 for more information.
Note that this so-called domain fronting does not utilize any cloud provider.
